citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:05 am-10:35 am
on 27-JUNE-23. Inspector called the contact number listed but was unable to leave a voice message. Inspector sent a
text message to the contact number listed and waited 30 minutes at the facility, however, was unable to conduct an
unannounced inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(a) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:05 am-10:35 am 
on 27-JUNE-23. Inspector called the contact number listed but was unable to leave a voice message. Inspector sent a 
text message to the contact number listed and waited 30 minutes at the facility, however, was unable to conduct an 
unannounced inspection. 
 
 
End Section
